## DynamicControlMapFromSchema type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type DynamicControlMapFromSchema<TForm extends object, TInputState extends object, TMap extends ControlSchemaMap<any>> = {
    [P in keyof TMap]: ConvertSchemaToControl<TForm, TInputState, TMap[P]>;
};
```
